definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Dr Metcalfe did not make money from the actual invention of Ethernet.
sentences.chinese: 梅特卡夫博士并没有从以太网的实质发明中赚钱。

sentences.english: Leaping over Caudine Forks is a theoretical viewpoint put forth by Marx in his remaining you.
sentences.chinese: 跨越卡夫丁峡谷是马克思晚年提出的一个理论观点。

sentences.english: I mean that the significance of the novel is more particular and more personal to Kafka.
sentences.chinese: 我指的是，对卡夫卡来说，这本小说别具深意。

sentences.english: Fallingwater is Wright designed for the Kafu Man family villa.
sentences.chinese: 流水别墅是赖特为卡夫曼家族设计的别墅。

sentences.english: Today, you can get shares of Kraft Foods for $34.
sentences.chinese: 如今，你可以按每股34美元的价格买进卡夫食品。

sentences.english: Scarf used to take a stroll.
Scarf is used to taking a walk after supper.
sentences.chinese: 斯卡夫现在习惯于在晚饭后散步。

sentences.english: Kraft Foods began to manufacturing various products from high-end to low-end.
sentences.chinese: 从高端产品到低端产品，卡夫都有所涉及。

sentences.english: Calffie, or the Calf, a former beautiful princess of a big farm kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 卡菲，也叫卡夫，先前一个大农场王国的美丽公主。

sentences.english: Scarf is used to taking a walk.
sentences.chinese: 斯卡夫现在已习惯于散步了。

sentences.english: Kraft stands to lose not only a lucrative business but also some "category captaincies".
sentences.chinese: 卡夫不仅失去了获利颇丰的业务而且部分领军地位。

sentences.english: Prepare as directed, using pre-cut KRAFT Cheese Cubes.
sentences.chinese: 准备的指示，使用前削减卡夫奶酪冰块。

sentences.english: So off went the two bears, and Cuffy played with the rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 两只小熊出发了，卡夫和兔子们一起玩。

sentences.english: Calf answers hoping that Froggie will be there for that five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 卡夫回答说，心里想着佛雷格可能愿意早到五分钟。

sentences.english: Morning. I need that Kafka's Motorbike release by 11:00.
sentences.chinese: 早，“卡夫卡摩托车”要在十一点发布新书促销新闻。

sentences.english: He is also regarded as "the Father of Fantastic Literature" in modernist literature.
sentences.chinese: 在现代主义文学中，卡夫卡被称为“荒诞文学之父”。

definition: rad (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Gore (name)/Al Gore (1948-), US vice-president 1993-2001 under Bill Clinton, subsequently environmental campaigner and Nobel Peace laureate
Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
